data.name: Season Pass (Episodes 2-4)
data.detailed_description:
Continue the story of Alex and try to save humanity from extinction. Code 7 is not the only threat as the phantom plague spreads further than anyone knew. Visit New Berlin in the pursuit of the truth above all things and make choices that will determine the end of your story.

This DLC contains:

  • Episode 2: Memory
  • Episode 3: Backdoor

Episode 4: Permutation will be available as a free update as soon as it is released.
data.about_the_game:
Continue the story of Alex and try to save humanity from extinction. Code 7 is not the only threat as the phantom plague spreads further than anyone knew. Visit New Berlin in the pursuit of the truth above all things and make choices that will determine the end of your story.

This DLC contains:

  • Episode 2: Memory
  • Episode 3: Backdoor

Episode 4: Permutation will be available as a free update as soon as it is released.
data.short_description: Get all remaining Episodes of Code 7 and help Alex save humanity
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 252M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: GHz Intel Core i7 2,5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Cor2Duo 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 252M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Cor2Duo 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 640
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
